item.title: Tristan Rogers, ‘General Hospital’ Actor, Dies at 79
item.description: Tristan Rogers, who starred as Robert Scorpio on “General Hospital,” died Friday of lung cancer. He was 79. Roger’s longtime manager, Meryl Soodak, confirmed the actor’s death to Variety. Soodak
